description.text: At IMPROV, our mission is to help business owners succeed in the restaurant industry while providing customers with a more affordable, diverse and enjoyable dining experience.
Even the best restaurants have empty tables throughout the day, but we're here to solve this problem!
We connect hungry stomachs with empty tables, bringing benefit to both customers and restaurant owners.
With each reservation, we contribute to our IMPROVing Lives program – making a difference one meal at a time.
We're in the lifestyle business providing happiness - Happy Stomachs, Happy Pockets, Brighter Futures.

title: Looking for a place to eat?

description.text: We want to make your dining experience even better!

Here on our website you’ll find the best discounts and promotions at your favourite restaurants! If you’re feeling adventurous, you can explore new places and find hidden gems throughout the city. We’ll find the best offer for you based on the type of food you’re craving, your party size, and the time you’d like to dine.

points.text: Get exclusive deals at your favourite restaurants
Contribute to a variety of causes around the world

description.text: Our goal is to eliminate empty tables, and provide efficient & inexpensive advertising to help your restaurant become an even bigger success!

We provide a platform that allows you to fill up tables during slow times. Promotions and discounts can be created based on customer traffic, and can be uploaded to IMPROV on a day-to-day basis, or on a schedule. These offers will be available to users on their computers or mobile devices, giving them incentive to try your food, fall in love, & become loyal customers.

points.text: And generate more profit, all at the same time!

description.text: If you want to work with us, please send us an email or give us a call!
